Ward B - Gina Hicks
===================





##### Elected May 2021

Gina Hicks bio – City Council May 2021

![City of Katy 2021 - 36 Web - Hicks, Gina](https://www.cityofkaty.com/home/showpublishedimage/3239/637631712020930000)

Gina Hicks was elected in May 2021 as a Ward B Councilmember. She grew up in Omaha, Nebraska and moved to Houston in 2005. After marrying her husband, Tom Hicks a Katy native in 2009 they moved to the greater Katy area and established their retail IT company off Mason Road.

In 2014, they built their new home in the Falls at Green Meadows and moved
into the city limits to raise th

Gina received a Bachelor’s Degree from Oklahoma Baptist University and moved to Houston for an opportunity at Second Baptist Church where she was on staff 13 years while owning an IT company the last 8 years. Gina served as a Children’s Director at the Katy campus and then had a short time in the graphics department before moving to the sch
ool and teaching Technology. In 2019, there was an opportunity to close the retail IT store and move to Cybersecurity and IT managed services. Gina and her husband have an IT service company and additionally she joined good friends in starting their Restoration services company in March 2021. Gina states, “busy people know how to get things done and use their resources to solve problems.”

To contact her directly, please e-mail
[councilmembers@cityofkaty.com](mailto:councilmembers@cityofkaty.com)
.
